name: jumbled manifesto
description:
Sometimes getting information you  care about is like rummaging in a dark room full of trash.

A jumbled up manifesto. Dive in and dig out some of the thoughts that I sometimes think!

You'll find different things every time you play but don't worry about missing anything.

It might be a bit too dark on some screens but the visuals aren't necessary  to get the full experience.

Feel free to leave your own thoughts on making games in the comments.
